title: Ion Etching Modulates the Synthesis of CoCuNi sulfide for high-performance Supercapacitors

The development of electrochemical supercapacitors have attracted a lot of attention in recent years because of the increasing demand for efficient, high-power energy storage. However, SC's energy storage capacity is...
